        await self.query( "*" ).remove()

    async def populate( self ) -> None:
        await self.clear()
        await self.mount( *[
            Label( f"[@click=app.populate]Repopulate this widget[/] {n}")
            for n in range( 20 )
        ] )

    async def on_mount( self ) -> None:
        await self.populate()

class AsyncClickApp( App[ None ] ):

    def compose( self ) -> ComposeResult:
